attributes.action: Call a vote of no confidence in the government
attributes.additional_details:
The government's handling of the Covid 19 pandemic has been atrocious, with thousands of excess deaths that could have been prevented, constant U turns on policies and very poor support for the general public.

As a second wave of infections seems to be imminent, we need a strong and stable government who can lead us out of this mess, not to mention the impending Brexit fiasco amongst other things.
attributes.background: Hold a vote of no confidence in the government for their incompetence during this terrifying period, acknowledge that they have poorly served the public, and provide the British people with a government that can actually lead.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314151
